thread.title: Attempt to Break Italian Government Impasse Fails

author: Giovanni Legorano
title: Attempt to Break Italian Government Impasse Fails
text:
A fresh attempt to broker an agreement to form a new government in Italy fell into disarray on Friday, after a presidential mediator failed to bridge differences that have persisted among the parties since last monthâ€™s national elections.
Earlier this week, President Sergio Mattarella asked Elisabetta Casellati, speaker of the Italian Senate, to conduct talks with political parties and try to break an impasse that has made the formation of a new government impossible since the March 4 vote.
